Articles.Content:
1. Build a ship using any parts, ship must be under 15 parts.

2. Have a lander on ship with scientific equipment

3.drop the rover and have it land sucsessfully on duna.

4.Land on Ike, plant a flag, take a surface sample

5.take off and fly to kerbin and land sucessfully on kerbin

(!!Bonus!!): Use the probe u dropped to collect data and drive it around.

p.s: Their is an easter egg on Duna.!!!

Post all future challang e suggestions and/or complaints below. if you have completed this challange feel free to post video below and/or email it to me at [email protected]. Thanks and Enjoy

P.S I will be posting an example mission of me completeing this mission below.

One more thing, Do Not Edit Save Files Like Scott Manly on this video. This was a funny glitch but in order to complete this challange you must do it legit.

Here is the link to that video if you want to see it,
